plot outline: A young student with dreams of becoming an entrepreneur, travels with his friends to his uncle's abandoned bungalow. While they engage in a process of renovating the building to convert it into a hotel, they face terrifying paranormal events. Can they escape the haunted premises with their lives intact?
title: Bhootkaal
plot: A young student with dreams of becoming an entrepreneur, travels with his friends to his uncle's abandoned bungalow. While they engage in a process of renovating the building to convert it into a hotel, they face terrifying paranormal events. Can they escape the haunted premises with their lives intact?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
